member.name: T:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.IImageAnalyzer
member.summary: Represents a service for accessing the Azure Computer Vision API.

member.name: M:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.IImageAnalyzer.GetDescriptionForImageAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a description of the provided image.
member.param: Language of the returned description. Default language is English (en). For other supported languages see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/computer-vision/language-support#image-analysis.

member.name: T:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.Internal.IImageRecognitionService
member.summary: Represents a service for recognizing image content.

member.name: P:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.Internal.IImageRecognitionService.TimeoutInterval
member.summary: Number of milliseconds after which the request for the image description is canceled.

member.name: P:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.Internal.IImageRecognitionService.Language
member.summary: Language in which the image description should be returned. The default language is English (en). For other supported languages see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/computer-vision/language-support#image-analysis.

member.name: M:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.Internal.IImageRecognitionService.GetImageDescriptionAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a description of the provided image.
member.returns: Description of the image or null when none of the descriptions match the minimum confidence or if the image recognition feature is not configured correctly.

member.name: F:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.Internal.ImageRecognitionConstants.ENABLE_IMAGE_RECOGNITION_SETTING_KEY
member.summary: Setting key for enabling the image recognition service.

member.name: F:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.Internal.ImageRecognitionConstants.IMAGE_RECOGNITION_API_ENDPOINT_SETTING_KEY
member.summary: Setting key for the image recognition API endpoint.

member.name: F:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.Internal.ImageRecognitionConstants.IMAGE_RECOGNITION_API_KEY_SETTING_KEY
member.summary: Setting key for the image recognition API key.

member.name: F:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.Internal.ImageRecognitionConstants.IMAGE_RECOGNITION_CONFIDENCE_SETTING_KEY
member.summary: Setting key for the image recognition minimum confidence.

member.name: T:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.Internal.ImageRecognitionService
member.summary: Implementation of the image recognition service.

member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.

member.name: T:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.IImageResizer
member.summary: Provides methods for image size reduction.

member.name: M:CMS.ComputerVision.Azure.IImageResizer.Resize(System.IO.Stream,System.Single)
member.summary: Changes dimensions of an image given by proportionally by given .
member.param: Resizing coefficient. The only valid values are in interval from 0 (not included) to 1 (not included).
member.returns: A stream with resized image data.
member.remarks: Implementation shouldn't modify the stream passed in the method.
member.exception: If value of doesn't fit into interval (0, 1).
